Entries.Event_Grave3: Oh, it's because you think I'm a momma's boy... isn't it? Ugh...$u^Why? I'm just as strong as you!$a#$b#I'm not some fragile prince charming.. I can take care of myself!$a#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Entries.fall_Thu: #$1 AbigailHAND#Last night I dreamt that my left hand had turned into a gigantic %noun. Does that mean anything?#$e#%Albert doesn't seem to be interested in talking right now.
Entries.spring_23: Well, tomorrow is the flower dance. Dancing is alright, but they make me wear this stupid blue suit...$s

Entries.winter_Tue: Hey, can you go find Hayden and tell him I said 'hi'?
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hey, @. Could you do me a favor?$l#$b#If you see Hayden, tell him I'm busy.$l#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Tue4_inlaw_Haley: I'll admit... I was a little jealous when you and Hayden got married. But, hey... It's a chance for me to learn something new about myself.$9

Entries.Mon: I wish Al wouldn't spend so much time in his room.
Entries.Mon8: #$1 Caroline23#When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the Wizard's tower. Don't tell Pierre, he has jealousy issues.#$e#Albert was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if he'll ever experience life outside the valley?
Entries.Sat: Is it just me, or does Albert have an unhealthy interest in doom and gloom?#$e#Maybe I'm just too old to understand.
Entries.Sat_inlaw_Abigail: Dinner's been a lot quieter since Albert moved out...#$e#No, not because he used to chew with his mouth open!$h
Entries.Sat2: Al's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where he gets it from...
Entries.Sat4: Al's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where he gets it from...
Entries.summer_Sat: Is it just me, or does Albert look a little pale?#$e#Maybe I'm just worrying about him too much.
Entries.summer_Sat_inlaw_Abigail: How's Albert's health? He's always been such a pale boy. Hopefully the farm lifestyle puts a little color in his cheeks.
Entries.fall_Mon: Fall is Al's favorite season, so I'm hoping he'll come out of his room more often.
Entries.fall_Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Al was taking online classes here, but I don't think his heart was really in it...#$e#He's a free spirit, like I was before I met Pierre. He's probably having the time of his life on your farm.
Entries.fall_Sat: Is it just me, or does Albert play too many video games?#$e#Maybe I'm a little old-fashioned.
Entries.winter_Sat: Don't you think Al would look better with his natural hair color?#$e#He used to have light chestnut-colored hair.

Entries.Introduction: Greetings! I'm Demetrius, local scientist and father. Thanks for introducing yourself!#$e#I'm studying the local plants and animals from my home laboratory.#$b#Have you met my son Marcus? He's interested to meet you.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Robin won't even tell *me* who paid for Pam's new house!#$e#I pretend I'm mad at her but secretly I'm glad she's so loyal to her word...$h
Entries.Mon: Marcus helps me out in the lab sometimes... He's a good kid.
Entries.Mon_inlaw_Maru: It's hard to do good science without Marcus's help...#$b#But his happiness is much more important than my experiment!
Entries.summer_Fri: $p 40#So I heard Marcus had you look through that telescope out back.|If you and Marcus become friends, I'm sure he'll show you how to use that telescope out back.#$e#Pretty exciting, huh?
Entries.summer_Fri_inlaw_Maru: I hope my son's keeping up on his math and science!
Entries.fall_Fri: Marcus sure spends a lot of time working on those gadgets of his.#$e#I'm glad he's so dedicated.
Entries.fall_Fri_inlaw_Maru: I'm still flabbergasted about Marcus's secret robot... was it all a dream?

Entries.Mon: Have I told you Hayden and I are brothers? Strange, isn't it?
Entries.Mon6: I wish Hayden would get a job or at least contribute to cooking and cleaning.$s#$e#I think he's hoping to marry someone rich.$u
Entries.Mon6_inlaw_Haley: I have to say, now that Hayden's gone I've had a much easier time keeping things in order.
Entries.summer_Mon: Hayden is a picky eater. It's so hard to cook for him.
Entries.summer_Mon_inlaw_Haley: Hayden and I get along much better now that he's moved out. I look forward to his visits!
Entries.winter_Wed: Hayden and I aren't made for such a big house. It's a hassle to keep it clean.#$e#Ah well. I really shouldn't be complaining.#$e#Your farmhouse seems nice and cozy.$h
Entries.winter_Sun6: My brother and I might fight sometimes, but I would really miss him if he left.#$e#I think he'll become a very nice young man some day... Don't tell him I said that.$h#$e#So, is there anything you want to talk about?
Entries.winter_Sun6_inlaw_Haley: Say hi to my brother for me! And remind him to visit me tomorrow.

Entries.reject_866: That's a very pretty rose, dear. Have you shown it to Emil? It makes me think of him.

Entries.Wed: Emil's been working here for a while now. I don't know what I'd do without him!#$e#I would hate to have to clean all those pots by myself.$s
Entries.Thu6: Clint comes into the saloon almost every night and sits at the same table by himself.#$e#Sometimes he glances over at Emil with a nervous look. Hmmm.#$e#Maybe that's why he comes in so often. Oh well, that means more business for me.

Entries.Wed: Why hello there! If you see my friend Emil in town, could you tell him I said 'Hi'?#$e#Thanks!$h

Entries.Thu2: Mister Perry is teaching me how to write in cursive.$h#$e#He has such pretty handwriting.

Entries.Wed: Between Linus and Mister Perry, I'm going to learn everything there is to learn!$h#$e#Mayor Lewis says I'm on the fast track to becoming a 'well-rounded citizen'... whatever that means.
Entries.4: I saw a big mango floating in the sky. Linus told me it was a hot-air balloon!$u#$b#I thought only birds could fly...

Entries.Wed: Why hello there! If you see my friend Emil in town, could you tell him I said 'Hi'?#$e#Thanks!$h

Entries.spouseRoom_Haley: #$c .5#Go ahead and start your day, honey. I'm just sprucing up here.#$e#Have any plans for the day?

Entries.Introduction: Oh! Aren't you the one who just moved in?#$b#I'm Marcus. I've been looking forward to meeting you!$h#$e#You know, with a small town like this, a new face can really alter the community dynamic. It's exciting!

Entries.Trailer_Entry: Perry! Did you make dinner?/Perry! You done your chores?/Perry! You home?/Hey! I'm home!
Entries.Thu: #$1 PamDrunk#Blahh... I had one too many caramel porters at the saloon last night... Go away.$k#$e#My house ain't pretty but at least it's by the river.#$e#Hey. Perry's my baby boy. Be nice to him or leave him alone, got it?
Entries.Thu4: Perry says I spend too much time at the saloon...$s
Entries.fall_Thu: Perry's the only one I've got, so you best treat him kindly.
Entries.winter_Tue4: I just hope Perry has a good life ahead of him. If you ever have kids you'll know how I feel.#$e#...It's so dry in winter. My skin feels like old parchment.
Entries.winter_Tue4_inlaw_Penny: Hey. You better be treatin' Perry right on that old farm of yours. He's the only one I got!
Entries.winter_Fri: Perry sure does like old books. I think he's a heck of a lot smarter than I ever was.#$e#I'm glad.

Entries.Thu6: I wish I could keep a garden, but our yard is such a mess.$u#$e#Maybe I'll live in a place where I can have a garden someday.#$e#Maybe I'll live on a farm! *chuckle*$h
Entries.summer_Fri: $d bus#I heard you were responsible for fixing the bus back up. Thank you.|My mother used to drive the bus to calico desert... but the bus stopped working a few years ago. Mayor says there's not enough money in the town coffers, or else he'd have it fixed.$u
Entries.fall_Fri6: When I was a little boy, my father abandoned us because he said he felt 'trapped'. We haven't seen him since.$s#$b#I'm sorry to make things uncomfortable for you... It's just that this time of year makes me think of it for some reason.$u#$e#Anyway... How's the farming life going?

Entries.Mon4_inlaw_Abigail: Hi, @. How's Albert doing? The shop hasn't been the same without him...
Entries.Thu8: #$1 pierre2#Does Albert look anything like me? Don't tell my wife, but sometimes I wonder if I'm really the father.$k$s#$e#Don't tell my wife, but I hate to cook dinner.

Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Perry seem really happy.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Perry seem really happy.
Entries.fall_Mon: #$1 RobinMaru#Marcus likes gems. He uses them in his inventions.#$e#So how are you and Marcus getting along?

Entries.Resort_Towel_2: Maybe I should learn to play the ukelele.#$e#Al on the congas and Sebastian on the steel drums... 'The Pelicans of Paradise'...$s#$e#What's the matter, you look worried.$h

Entries.Wed: Why hello there! If you see my friend Emil in town, could you tell him I said 'Hi'?#$e#Thanks!$h

Entries.Wed2: Sam is probably my only friend in this town.#$e#Well, Al is nice too, but...$h#$e#Umm.. nevermind.
Entries.Thu4: Why does everyone like Marcus so much? Sure, he's smart and friendly, but don't they realize it's all just an attention-grabbing scam?#$e#Sorry...$s
Entries.winter_Sun6: I built a snowgoon but Demetrius made me get rid of it... yet Marcus's cute little snowman goes unharmed!$a#$e#Ridiculous.

Entries.Tue6: Can you keep a secret, mister?^Can you keep a secret, miss?$u#$b#I wanna marry Mister Perry when I grow up.#$e#Just don't tell him, okay?$u
Entries.Sat: Mister Perry makes me read a new book every week.$s#$b#At least he lets me pick them, sometimes!

Entries.Thu10: You musn't tell anyone... but I have reason to believe that one of the locals is actually my son...#$e#I could be mistaken... It's rare, but it does happen.

Entries.Maru0: I'm really excited.$h#$b#I'm going to be your husband. Hehe.$l
Entries.Maru1: I need to get mentally prepared for being a farmer's husband.
